languages.text: "Воля Ткача — твоя воля. Не забывай об этом". {n}Голоса начинают меркнуть.{/n} "Отринь ложные убеждения. Найди третий восход. Закончи... узор..."
"The Weaver's will is your own. Remember that." {n}The voices begin to fade.{/n} "Cast off false beliefs. Find the Third Dawn. Complete... the pattern..."
languages.original_text: "Воля Ткача — твоя воля. Не забывай об этом". {n}Голоса начинают меркнуть.{/n} "Отринь ложные убеждения. Найди третий восход. Закончи... узор..."

traits.locale_text: "The Weaver's will is your will. Remember that." {n}Voices start fading.{/n} "Cast off the false beliefs. Find the Third Dawn. Complete... the pattern..."

languages.text: “命运编织者的意志就是你自己的意志，记住这点。”{n}声音开始变弱。{/n}“摒弃错误的信念。寻找第三黎明。完成……图案……”
languages.original_text: "The Weaver's will is your own. Remember that." {n}The voices begin to fade.{/n} "Cast off false beliefs. Find the Third Dawn. Complete... the pattern..."

traits.locale_text: “命运编织者的意志就是你自己的意志，记住这点。”{n}声音开始变弱。{/n}“摒弃错误的信念。寻找第三黎明。完成……图案……”

languages.text: « La volonté du Tisseur est la vôtre. Ne l'oubliez pas. » {n}Les voix deviennent de moins en moins audibles.{/n} « Repoussez les fausses croyances. Trouvez la Troisième Aube. Achevez... le motif... »
languages.original_text: "The Weaver's will is your own. Remember that." {n}The voices begin to fade.{/n} "Cast off false beliefs. Find the Third Dawn. Complete... the pattern..."

traits.locale_text: « La volonté du Tisseur est la vôtre. Ne l'oubliez pas. » {n}Les voix deviennent de moins en moins audibles.{/n} « Repoussez les fausses croyances. Trouvez la Troisième Aube. Achevez... le motif... »

languages.text: 「ウィーヴァーの意志はお前自身の意志。覚えておくことだ」{n}声が消え始める。{/n}「誤った信念を取り払え。第三の黎明を見つけるのだ。紋様を…完成させよ…」
languages.original_text: "The Weaver's will is your own. Remember that." {n}The voices begin to fade.{/n} "Cast off false beliefs. Find the Third Dawn. Complete... the pattern..."

traits.locale_text: 「ウィーヴァーの意志はお前自身の意志。覚えておくことだ」{n}声が消え始める。{/n}「誤った信念を取り払え。第三の黎明を見つけるのだ。紋様を…完成させよ…」

languages.text: «La voluntad del Tejedor es también la tuya. Recuérdalo». {n}Las voces empiezan a desvanecerse.{/n} «Despójate de las falsas creencias. Encuentra el Tercer Amanecer. Completa... la pauta...».
languages.original_text: "The Weaver's will is your own. Remember that." {n}The voices begin to fade.{/n} "Cast off false beliefs. Find the Third Dawn. Complete... the pattern..."

traits.locale_text: «La voluntad del Tejedor es también la tuya. Recuérdalo». {n}Las voces empiezan a desvanecerse.{/n} «Despójate de las falsas creencias. Encuentra el Tercer Amanecer. Completa... la pauta...».

languages.text: "Der Wille des Webers ist der Eure. Merkt Euch das." {n}Die Stimmen verhallen.{/n} "Lasst Eure falschen Überzeugungen fahren. Findet die Dritte Dämmerung. Vervollständigt ... das Muster ..."
languages.original_text: "The Weaver's will is your own. Remember that." {n}The voices begin to fade.{/n} "Cast off false beliefs. Find the Third Dawn. Complete... the pattern..."

traits.locale_text: "Der Wille des Webers ist der Eure. Merkt Euch das." {n}Die Stimmen verhallen.{/n} "Lasst Eure falschen Überzeugungen fahren. Findet die Dritte Dämmerung. Vervollständigt ... das Muster ..."

"Der Wille des Webers ist Euer Wille. Merkt Euch das." {n}Die Stimmen beginnen zu verstummen.{/n} "Werft Eure falschen Überzeugungen über Bord. Findet die Dritte Dämmerung. Vervollständigt ... das Muster ..."

languages.text: "Dokuyan'ın isteği senin de isteğin. Unutmayasın." {n}Sesler kesilmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Sahte inançlardan sakın. Üçüncü Şafak'ı bul. Örgeyi... Tamamla..."
languages.original_text: "The Weaver's will is your own. Remember that." {n}The voices begin to fade.{/n} "Cast off false beliefs. Find the Third Dawn. Complete... the pattern..."
